name: Secrétaire
description: Secrétaire; Unknown maker, Northern European; Northern; about 1780; Oak carcass, with the drawer construction on the upper section being possibly poplar, veneered with satinwood, fruitwoods, tulipwood, and ebony, with stained and painted decoration; 152 x 92 x 55.6 cm (59 13/16 x 36 1/4 x 21 7/8 in.); 85.DA.147; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Secrétaire
medium: Oak carcass, with the drawer construction on the upper section being possibly poplar, veneered with satinwood, fruitwoods, tulipwood, and ebony, with stained and painted decoration
